College_Name: St Joseph's College for Women, Alappuzha
College_Summary: St. Joseph’s College for Women is a Catholica ladies college established in 1954 and located in Alappuzha, Kerala. The institute is affiliated to the University of Kerala and accredited by NAAC at grade B++.

College_Name: Sivagiri Sree Narayana Medical Mission College of Nursing, Thiruvananthapuram
Sree Gokulam Arts and Science College Balussery, Kozhikode
College_Summary: Sree Gokulam Arts and Science College is a private educational institution located at Balussery, Kerala, dedicating its services since 2013. It is affiliated to the University of Calicut, one of the top universities in India.

College_Name: Nasra College Of Arts & Science, Malappuram
Sree Narayana Institute of Ayurvedic Studies and Research - [SNIASR], Kollam
College_Summary: Sree Narayana Institute of Ayurvedic Studies and Research (SNIASR) was established in the year 2004 by the Sree Narayana Health Care Society. The college is Private and the institute is located at Pangode, Puthur, in Kollam District of Kerala. Institute is affiliated with Kerala Unversity of Health Sciences and is recognized by C.C.I.M and AYUSH. The college offers UG, PG, Panchakarma courses to its students. The intake capacity of the college is 60 students for five years and six months in B.A.M.S course.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery

College_Name: Govt. College of Teacher Education - [GCTE], Thiruvananthapuram
Snehodaya College of Nursing Vallakkunnu, Thrissur
National College Of Arts And Science, Thiruvananthapuram

College_Summary: St Aloysius College, located in Elthuruth, Thrissur is a first-grade college. It is affiliated with the University of Calicut, Kerala, and is also accredited by NAAC. Established in 1968, the college offers sixteen under-graduate and eight postgraduate courses. Some of the popular courses provided include B.com, BBA, BSc. MSc. BA, MA, etc. It has about 2000 students enrolled in different Courses. The college also has around 103 faculties in various departments.

College_Name: National College Of Arts And Science, Kozhikode
St Gregorios college of nursing Parumala, Pathanamthitta

College_Summary: St. Joseph's College Thrissur, established in 1964, is the first college for women in Kerala It is affiliated to the University of Calicut and NAAC has accredited this college with ‘A’ Grade. The college offers Undergraduate, Post-graduate, Doctoral programs across various specializations. The UG & PG programs are offered under two categories- Self-Financing programs & Govt. Aided programs.

College_Name: Cochin University of Science and Technology, School of Management Studies
College_Summary: School of Management Studies (SMS) was established in 1964, making it one of the oldest B-Schools in the country, and with a legacy of more than 5000 alumni across the world. SMS is part of the prestigious State-owned Cochin University of Science and Technology (CUSAT), Kochi.  CUSAT is Re-Accredited by NAAC with Grade A+ and at all India 41st rank by NIRF.

College_Summary: St Mary's College Puthanangadi is the first educational institution of CFIC in India as inaugurated by district collector Malappuram. It was established on 17 June 1996. It has 12 graduate and two postgraduate courses such as BA, B.Sc, B.Com, MA, and M.Com. The admission to these courses is based on merit. Application mode is both online and offline.

College_Name: CSI Christian Muller Women's College - [CMWC], Vadakara

College_Summary: St. Mary's College is the First Women's College of Thrissur District set by The Congregation of Mother of Carmel (CMC). The National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) ranked St. Mary’s College at 55 for the year 2017. The women’s college offers various Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Vocational and Certificate programs. The courses offered include BA, B.Sc., BCA, B.Com, BBA, BSW and BVOC at the Undergraduate level and MA, M.Sc., and M.Com. programs at the postgraduate level. The selection procedure is entirely merit based. The application mode for the admission is both online as well as offline.

College_Name: De Paul Arts and Science College Edathotty, Kannur
St Teresa's Arts and Science College Kottakkal, Thrissur
St Xavier's Arts and Science College, Kozhikode

College_Summary: Government Dental College, Kozhikode is a government college also referred to as GDC Kozhikode. The college was established in the year 1981 in Kozhikode in the state of Kerala. GDC Kozhikode is affiliated with Kerala University of Health Sciences, Thrissur. The Government dental institute has been approved by the Dental Council of India (DCI), Government of India. GDC Kozhikode is the second dental college in the government sector in India. It is one of the reputed colleges and offers undergraduate, postgraduate and paramedical courses to students with the best faculty and facilities.

College_Name: Divine Institute of Media Science Muringoor - [DIMS] Muringoor, Thrissur

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts [BA] (Journalism and Mass Communication)

College_Name: CPA College Of Arts And Science Punnathala, Malappuram
DM Wayanad Institute of Medical Sciences (DM WIMS)
College_Summary: DM Wayanad Institute of Medical Sciences is a medical college situated in Wayanad, Kerala. The medical college along with a hospital, a nursing college and a pharmacy college is the brainchild of DM Education and Research Foundation trust. The 50 acres of green campus is the first Medical College in Kerala established in a Backward, Hilly & Tribal District to change the scenario of healthcare in the area. The institute is affiliated to the Kerala University of Health Sciences, Thrissur and is well-recognized and approved by the Medical Council of India (MCI).

Sree Narayana College is a private institution established in 1965. The college is located in Punalur, Kollam, Kerala, and is affiliated to the University of Kerala (KU), Thiruvananthapuram. The college has been accredited with Grade ‘B’ by NAAC with CGPA 2.1.

College_Name: Khansa Women's College For Advance Studies, Kasaragod
Little Flower Institute of Medical Science & Research Centre - [LIMSAR] Angamaly, Ernakulam

College_Summary: Euro Tech Maritime Academy, Kochi established in the year 2005 is a premier institute in Maritime Training. It has been affiliated to the Indian Maritime University, Chennai since 2009 and has also been approved by the Directorate General of Shipping, Mumbai, India. The Academy offers various pre-sea and post-sea programs. The faculties are well-trained, sufficiently qualified, and devoted to giving quality education to its students.

Sree Anjaneya Dental College provides highly advanced infrastructure which includes a sports complex, cafeteria, and well-maintained separate hostels for boys and girls, along with high-technology labs and an extensive library. The institute has been honoured with the Youth Innovators Award for its work on ‘Dentodiagnostick’ twice.

College_Name: CHMM College for Advanced Studies, Thiruvananthapuram
College_Summary: CHMM College for Advanced Studies, established in 1995, is located near NH 47, 3 kilometres from Paripally Junction. The college is a private, Co-ed College, which is affiliated to UGC. Situated in lush green village town Chavarcode, The CHMM college campus is spread over a 25-acre compound. The studiousness of the campus atmosphere is enriched by sprawling playgrounds and other recreational facilities.

College_Name: St. James College of Pharmaceutical Sciences Chalakudy, Thrissur
Sanjo College of Pharmaceutical Studies - [SCOPS], Palakkad
College_Summary: Sanjo College of Pharmaceutical Studies(SCOPS) is situated in Palakkad, Kerala, and is established in the year 2014. The college is located in a lavish green atmosphere, is well maintained, eco friendly, and clean. Sanjo College of Pharmaceutical Studies is a private college and is approved by the AICTE. The college provides UG, and Degree level courses. There are about 19 faculties and about 211 is the total student entry.

College_Name: Nehru Academy of Law, Palakkad, Kerala
College_Summary: Nehru Academy of Law (NAL), was established in the year 2015. Nehru Academy of Law is an establishment by Nehru Group of Institution. It is located in Palakkad, Kerala. Nehru Academy of Law is having an affiliation with the reputed University of Calicut. NAL is approved by the Bar Council of India and is managed by NGI (Nehru Group of Institution).

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Business Administration + Bachelor of Laws [BBALLB] {Hons.}
Bachelor of Commerce + Bachelor of Laws [BCom L.L.B.] {Hons.}

College_Name: Bhavan's Royal Institute of Management - [BRIM], Kochi
College_Summary: Bhavan’s Royal Institute of Management (BRIM), endorsed by the Kochi Kendra of Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan and recognized  as IEDC of Kerala Startup Mission. It was set up in the year 2002, in Tripunithura, Kochi. The Institute offers two-year full-time MBA program, approved by AICTE, New Delhi and affiliated to CUSAT, Kochi. With 118 Offices spread over all parts of India and 7 centers abroad in the UK, Portugal, USA, and Mexico, Bhavan has attained a true International Indian character/ culture and sponsors more than 373 institutions all over the world.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Master of Business Administration [MBA] (Logistics & Shipping Management)

College_Name: Parumala Mar Gregorios College - [PMG] Valanjavattom, Thiruvalla

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor in Hospitality Management [BHM] + Master of Business Administration [MBA]

College_Summary: National Institute of Fashion Technology (NIFT), Kannur, established in 2008, is located in God's own country, Kerala. It is ranked 9th amongst the 16 NIRF institutes across India, which is truly an achievement. Some of the top recruiters of NIFT Kannur are Arvind Lifestyle Brands Limited, Bata India Limited, H&M, Manyavar, and many other famous and popularly known brands and companies.

College_Summary: Chinmaya Vidyapeet is a private college established in the year 1995. It is located in Ernakulam, Kerala. The college is deemed to be a university. The college is affiliated by UGC. Chinmaya Vidyapeet offers UG and PG courses in the streams of Arts, Science and Commerce. At the UG level, the college offers B.Com., BBM, BCA and BA in 2 specializations. At the PG level, the college offers M.Com in its curriculum. Chinmaya Vidyapeet is equipped with all the facilities for the students. Chinmaya Vidyapeet focuses is studies and extra-curricular activities equally.

College_Name: Malikdeenar Arts & Science College for Women, Ernakulam

College_Summary: Mannam Memorial N.S.S. College in Kerala was established in 2002 by NSS Taluk Union, Pathanamthitta. The College offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses in Engineering, Commerce, Computer, and Journalism domains like B.Com, B.Sc, BA, B.S.W, BBA, M.Sc, MSW, M.Com. The admission is based on merit and the application mode is online.

Government Medical College, Parippally, commonly known as GMC Kollam, is one of the most prestigious medical colleges in Kerala. GMC Kollam offers only one course at the undergraduate level i.e. MBBS. The basic eligibility for the MBBS course is 50% aggregate marks in 10+2 with PCB. The students are selected for admission based on merits obtained in NEET UG examination. The application process for admission is online.

Kannur Medical College Kannur, known as KMC Kannur, is an affiliation of Kerala University of Health Sciences, Thrissur. The college offers MBBS and PG courses in 11 specializations. The minimum eligibility for MBBS is 10+2 with minimum 50% marks in PCB/ Biotech combined and the minimum eligibility for PG admission must be a graduate with an MBBS degree. Admission to the college is entrance-based. For UG admissions, candidates must appear for the NEET-UG program, and for the PG admissions, candidates must appear for the NEET PG program. The application process for admission is online through the official website.

College_Name: Mannam Ayurveda Co-operative Medical College Pandalam, Pathanamthitta
College_Summary: The Mannam Ayurveda Cooperative Medical College is located and was founded in 2005. It is owned, funded and run by the Mannam Sugar Mills Co-operative Ltd. as a self-financed college.

College_Summary: Ahalia School of Pharmacy (ASP) is a private institution established in 1984. The college is approved by the Pharmacy Council of India (PCI) and is affiliated to Kerala University of Health Sciences (KUHS), Thrissur.

College_Summary: Government Law College, Kozhikode was established in the year 1970. It is affiliated with the University of Calicut and approved by Bar Council of India (BCI). The college offers LLB and Integrated LLB at UG level and LLM at PG level. Admission to these courses are offered on the basis of score obtained in Kerala Law Entrance Examination (KLEE) conducted by the Commissioner for Entrance Examinations (CEE), Government of Kerala.

College_Summary: Al-Ameen Law College, one of the flagship institutions of Al-Ameen, is well-known for its 3 year LLB program, a 5 year BBA. LLB program and an LLM program. Students are admitted to the college based on marks obtained in the computer-based entrance exam conducted by the CEE. Also, the college is blessed with faculty members teaching at the institute with 20-25 years of experience in the relevant field.

College_Summary: Government Law College, Thrissur, Kerala was established in 1992. It is approved by the Bar Council of India and is affiliated with University of Calicut. The college offers various law courses such as LLB, BBA LLB (Hons) and LLM. Admission is based on the rank obtained in the KLEE entrance examination. Application forms are available in online mode.

College_Summary: CSI Institute of Legal Studies, popularly known as CSIILS is a private law college located in Cheruvarakonam, Thiruvananthapuram. Founded in the year 2013, the college is affiliated to Kerala State University and approved by the Bar Council of India as well as the Government of Kerala. The primary objective of the institution is to impart quality research-oriented legal education to enable rural students to expand the horizon of their legal knowledge.

College_Summary: NSS Law College Kottiyam, situated in the Kollam district of Kerala is established in 2012 by Nair Service Society. It is affiliated to the University of Kerala. The college which is known for its quality academic performance of the students is the first self-financing law college in the state and is recognised by the Bar Council of India.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [B.A.L.L.B.]

College_Summary: CSI College for Legal Studies is a dedicated law College established in the year 2013 at Kottayam, Kerala. It is affiliated to Mahatma Gandhi University, Kottayam, and approved by Bar Council of India. It offers integrated UG and PG law program and seats are filled on the basis of entrance test and merit. Candidates can apply to this College online by filling the application form.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [BALLB] {Hons.}

Post Graduate Diploma in Logistics and Shipping
International Post Graduate Diploma in Shipping and Logistics

College_Summary: KMCT Polytechnic College located at Kozhikode offers diploma in 10 branches of Engineering on the state of Kerala. Over the years, the college has become most preferable Polytechnic College in the state. The college provides regular as well as lateral entry into its diploma courses.

Chinmaya Vishwa Vidyapeeth (CVV), Kochi offers B.Com, B.Sc, BA and BBA at the UG level. MA and M.Sc at PG level. The college also offers integrated courses of BA+B.ED and B.Sc+B.Ed. PhD program in various disciplines is offered. Admission to the PhD programs are in two stages; firstly candidate is required to clear Ph.D. Admissions Test (PAT), candidates who have cleared PAT are called for an interview where they have to present their research proposals. CVV accepts CUET scores for admissions to all UG programmes. CVV fees ranges from INR 1 Lakhs – 3 Lakhs.

College_Name: Holy Grace Academy Of Pharmacy - [HGAP], Thrissur

College_Summary: Government Polytechnic College (GPC), Perinthalmanna is a Govt institution established in the year 1961 to provide quality technical education. The institution which is located at Angadippuram in Perinthalmanna Taluk, Malappuram District and is spread across 8.73 hectares, was established under Directorate of Technical Education, Govt of Kerala and is approved by All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi.

Government Polytechnic College (GPC), Palakkad, Kerala was established on 1980. It is a state-run college which has become a premier institution of engineering and technology in Kerala over the years. It offers diploma courses in several Engineering branches. Admission to this premier college is based on the merit only. Big companies like Tech Mahindra, Ashok Leyland, TVS, and BEML Ltd. etc visit the campus every year for recruiting the students. The institution holds industrial collaborations and MOUs to sharpen the technical skills of the students studying here.

SCMS College of Polytechnics (SCMSCP), Ernakulam, Kerala, was founded in the year 1976. It offers diploma courses in various Engineering and Technical branches. Admissions to this college are strictly based on merit only. Candidates have to fill the application form online. With around 25 faculty members in the institution, the college imparts quality education in all the diploma specialized courses to meet the industrial needs in the trend. Placements are not that much great but it offers some value-added courses to upskill the students in all possible ways.

College_Name: MOSC Institute of Allied Health Sciences - [MOSCIAHS] Kolenchery, Ernakulam
College_Summary: MOSC Institute of Allied Health Sciences (MOSCIAHS) was formally consecrated as a hospital on 14th September 1970 with 100 beds and it has been growing steadily over the years into a multi-specialty; 1100 mbedded Super specialty tertiary care Medical College Hospital. The MOSC Medical College Hospital is located at Kolenchery, very near to Kochi-Madurai road NH 85, with wide campus sprawled across the scenic nlandscape. On the educational front, the hospital has access to all the clinical, pre-clinical, para-clinical, and super specialty departments.

Grace International Academy (GIA) is an undergraduate college affiliated to the University of Kerala, which started functioning in May 2019. It is located in Punalur, in Kollam district, and is a border town between Kerala and Tamil Nadu, situated a stone throw away from Punalur railway station and 70 km away from Thiruvananthapuram airport.

Ashtamgam Ayurveda Chikitsalayam & Vidyapeetham (AACV) is an institute of a class of its own established under the aegis of Ashtanga Educational Trust (AET) in the year 2011 which is dedicated for the cause of reviving the legacy of a great tradition of Ayurveda. It started its functioning as an OP consultation unit with a small treatment facility in the year 2013 and at present, it has one of the best Ayurvedic teaching hospitals in the state of Kerala, Ashtamgam Ayurveda Chikitsalayam, which is attached to a residential ayurvedic school, Ashtamgam Ayurveda Vidyapeetham.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery
Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery

College_Summary: Empire College of Science, established in 2017, is a private college affiliated to Jain (Deemed to be University) and approved by Govt. of Kerala. The college offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Health Care, Management and Aviation.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Business Administration [BBA] (Aviation and Logistics Management)
Master of Business Administration [MBA] Healthcare Management

College_Name: Government Industrial Training Institute Attingal - [GITIA], Thiruvananthapuram
College_Summary: Government ITI Attingal (GITIA) was established in 1972 in Chirayinkeezhu at Attingal. It is providing ITI training programs under Kerala Government. It provides NCTV training (skill) programs with 22 affiliated trade courses for around 1124 trainees. The institution also provides short-term courses for the trainees belonging to SC and ST categories. All admission processes at ITI Attingal are based on the marks obtained on 10th examinations from any recognized boards. It is recognized as a first grade and highly ranked ITI institute in the Kerala District. The trainees get placed through the institution placements cell in the NCTV affiliated trades.

Kerala government polytechnic college (KGPTC) was established in 1946 and is known for being one of the oldest and illustrious colleges in polytechnic education in Kerala. It offers 6 full-fledged departments with 6 engineering diploma programs like Civil Engineering, Computer Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Tool & Die Engineering, Computer Engineering (Hearing Impaired) under the Department of Technical Education, Kerala. The admission process is carried out by the Kerala state government online. The admission is done based on merit.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Diploma in Tool and Die Engineering

College_Summary: October 19, 2020: Last date of online application submission

College_Name: Government Industrial Training Institutes Malapuzha - [GITIM], Palakkad
Avukaderkutty Naha Sahib Memorial Government Polytechnic College - [AKNM GPTC], Malappuram
College_Summary: AKNM Government Polytechnic College was established in 1994 at Chelari, in Malappuram district. It is one of the well reputed AICTE approved institutes affiliated to the Directorate of Technical Education, Kerala.
Government Polytechnic College offers various diploma engineering programs in numerous specializations and is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE).

Thiagarajar Polytechnic College was established in 1956. The institute offers Diploma courses in 3 specializations: Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering. Admissions to these courses are conducted by the Directorate of Technical Education, Kerala. The eligibility to qualify for admissions is 10th pass. The facilities offered include Library, Auditorium, Laboratory, and many others. Scholarships are also provided.

Sree Narayana Polytechnic College was founded in 1957. It is located in a 15-acre campus at Kottiyam near Kollam, Kerala in South India. It is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE) and is better known as a technical Institute. SNPTC offers Diploma courses in Engineering for the duration of three years. The Admission criteria for SNPTC is that the student should have passed SSLC/THSLC or equivalent examination with eligibility for higher studies. The college is well known for its student festivals such as the arts festival, union inauguration. sports meet, women's day and poly day.

Central Polytechnic College, Vattiyoorkavu was established in 1958 and has been providing the best education in Kerala. The college is approved by AICTE and is affiliated to the State Board of Technical Education (SBTE). The College offers 3year diploma courses in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical & Electronics, Electronics, Textile Technology, and Computer Engineering. Many multinational companies and Indian companies including WIPRO, EVASOFT, HCL, Larson, MRF, QUEST GLOBAL, etc., have visited the College for recruiting the students.

College_Name: Jawaharlal Nehru Institute of Arts and Science - [JNIAS], Idukki

College_Summary: AWH Polytechnic College is situated in the state of Kerala managed by the Association for the Welfare of the Handicapped is a self financing college . The college is authorized by the Government of Kerala and All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). It is one of the prominent colleges in Engineering and located in a peaceful , evergreen campus at Kuttikkattoor , almost 12 km away from Calicut.

Balanagar Technical Institute was established in 1977. The private college is located at Ernamkulum, Kerala. Institute offers various technical courses. Courses offered here are Welder, draughtsman, etc. With its course affiliated to NCVT norms.

Aries Polytechnic College was established in 2013. With currently providing a diploma in 5 courses of engineering and technology. Admission to this college is done based on marks obtained in the entrance exam conducted by the institute. Entrance examination forms can be filled through offline mode only.

College_Name: Lourdes Matha Institute of Management Studies - [LMIMS], Thiruvananthapuram
College_Summary: Lourdes Matha Institute of Management Studies (LMIMS), Thiruvananthapuram is established by the “Lourdes Matha Catholic Educational Society”. The institute offers an MBA program in the discipline of Marketing, Finance, Human Resources, Operations, Information Systems. Admissions to the LMIMS is done on the basis of CMAT/CAT/KMAT scores followed by group discussion and personal interview. In addition to this, the institute arranges vacation training and project work for students in industries. The cell arranges management skill development programs and personality development programs. It continuously organizes training programs to enhance the employability of the students. The highest package is offered at INR 4.8 LPA and the average package is offered at INR 3.36 LPA. Check: LMIMS Thiruvananthapuram Placement

Government Industrial Training Institute is an Ernakulum based Government ITI that was established in 1957. The college offers certificate trading courses under several disciplines. The college is affiliated to the National Council of Vocational Training (NCVT), while it is certified by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO). The candidates seeking admission must meet the minimum eligibility criteria and if they fulfil that, the candidates will have to either appear in written test or qualify merit-based screening after which the interview takes place for finalizing the admission.
Government Polytechnic College, Adoor is one of the major Technical institutions in Pathanamthitta district situated at Manakkala in Adoor.

Government Polytechnic College, Cherthela was established in 1994. It offers 3-year Diploma programs in 5 specializations namely Computer Hardware, Electronics and Communication, Instrumentation, Mechanical, and Computer Engineering.

Government Polytechnic College Pala (GPTCP) at Kottayam was formed to impart technical education to students. The college offers 3-year duration diploma courses in four streams namely Computer, Electronics, Instrumentation and, Electrical and Electronics Engineering. Students often pursue B.Tech. or B.E. after completing a polytechnic course in order to pursue a career in Engineering. The college has an actively participating placements cell to invite various companies for the recruitment drive after completing diploma course.

Government Polytechnic, Kasaragod, one among the premier institutes of excellence under the government of Kerala got established in 1988 and it is located at Periye. This institute offers various diploma programs. It has an affiliation with the State Board of Technical Education, Kerala. The admission process only accepts Kerala Polytechnic exam scores for both the 1st and 2nd year admissions.

Government Polytechnic Thrissur, Kunnamkulam is an educational institution that offers technical education oriented diploma under the affiliation of Directorate of Technical Education, Kerala. The college was established in Thrissur district of Kerala and had obtained its approval from AICTE. The admission is completely merit-based (ranking based on qualifying exam marks) and the candidates must have passed THSLC/SSLC to qualify for admission. The Career guidance and Placement Cell of the College is a separate department that looks after every essential aspect required to forge a strong personality out of students.

Government Polytechnic College Attingal located at Thiruvananthapuram is one of the best polytechnic institutes in the state of Kerala. The college was started in 1994 by the Government of Kerala under the department of Technical Education. The college believes in the system of quality education by implementing it with well-experienced faculty. The college offers Technical Education in the form of a diploma program in 4 engineering branches. The admission to this college is based on the ranking/ merit list released by the Kerala Technical Education board.

Government Polytechnic College, Kothamangalam Kerala, one of the premier institutes of excellence under the government of Kerala, was established in 1983, situated in Aluva, Kerala. This institute offers various Diploma programs. It has an affiliation with the State Board of Technical Education, Kerala. The institute is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). The admission process is merit-based, the college accepts Kerala Polytechnic exam scores in their counseling process.

Indira Gandhi Polytechnic - [IGPT], Aluva, Kerala, one of the premier institutes of excellence under the government of Kerala, was established in 2014, situated in Aluva, Kerala. This institute offers various Diploma programs. It has an affiliation with the State Board of Technical Education, Kerala. The institute is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). The admission process is merit-based, the college accepts Kerala Polytechnic exam scores in their counseling process.

College_Name: Institute of Printing Technology & Government Polytechnic College- [IPTGTC] Shornur, Palakkad
College_Summary: Institute of Printing Technology & Government Polytechnic Shoranur situated in Shoranur, Kerala was established in 1967. The college offers diploma programs in three engineering streams. The admission procedure is completely merit-based. Candidates must have passed the 10th examination to be eligible for admission.

Ma’din Polytechnic College is a reputed self-financing polytechnic college located 5 km northwest of the city Malappuram, Kerala. It was established in 2011 as part of Ma’din Institutes. It offers 3-year diploma courses in 6 streams. The course admission is given in three modes as follows: Regular, Lateral Entry, and Part-time (Evening). The placements opportunities are readily available to the diploma holders being the technical skills-oriented course.

Government Polytechnic College Koratty, Thrissur is a leading institution under Government Sector offering value based technical training and education. The college offers three diploma courses in the branches of Polymer Technology (PT), Electronics and instrumentation (EI) and Textile Technology (TT). For taking admission, candidates have to apply through online mode after passing senior secondary Level examination from any recognised board. Finally, the students have to participate in state counselling of Kerala to get into the institution based on the ranking made out of the qualifying exams.

Government Polytechnic College Meppadi is one among the top polytechnic institutes at Wayanad in the state of Kerala. It is affiliated to Directorate of Technical Education under Government of Kerala and is recognised by AICTE. This college offers diploma courses across different branches of Engineering. Admission forms for this College can be filled through online mode only. Government Polytechnic College Meppadi is a suitable College for pursuing an Engineering Diploma in this locality. Quality Education is provided by this college, due to which their students could be encouraged to achieve success in their future.

College_Name: Sree Rama Government Polytechnic College, Thrissur
College_Summary: Sree Rama Government Polytechnic College, Thrissur was founded in the year 1958 under the private sector, but in the year 1972, the government of Kerala took over the polytechnic college and renamed it as Sree Rama Government Polytechnic College.

College_Name: Government Industrial Training Institute Chandanathope, Kollam
College_Summary: Government ITI Chandanathope was established in 1961. It offers industrial training certificates in 19 trades related to engineering. Admissions are given to the labor-certification courses for General carpenter, Painter general, sheet metal worker, welder, and wireman based on candidates who have passed class 8th. Students for other classes (particularly in the technical domain) must have an SSLC certificate. The application mode is both online and offline

Government ITI Peravoor was established in 2009. It offers various diploma certificate courses in industrial training, affiliated by NCVT. With total seats of 48, ITI Peravoor is one of Kerela's best institutes with vocational courses in industrial training. It provides certification in Draughtsman Civil and Mechanic Motor Vehicle. The admission is based on merit and application mode is both online and offline.

Established in the year 1961, Government Women’s Polytechnic College is approved by AICTE and offers diploma course in numerous specializations. In addition to this, College also offers short-term programmes through continuing education cell as well as apparel fashion designing through district panchayat. The admission to the Diploma programme in this premier College is strictly based on merit. Candidates have to fill the application form in online mode.

Seethi Sahib Memorial Polytechnic College, popularly known as SSM Polytechnic College, is one of the renowned technical colleges in India. SSM Polytechnic College is a government aided private institute, approved by AICTE and was established in 1962 by KMEA.

London College, Kochi is a globally reputed educational institution offers various management programs in Logistics, Shipping and Supply Chain Management, Retail Management, Business Management, Accounts & Finance Management. The institute has successfully placed more than 1800+ students in India and Middle East Asia. London College is a globally reputed educational institution offering students from across the world, high-quality education at an affordable cost. London College organises Industrial Institute Interface sessions, Case studies and Industrial visits for the students to get knowledge and experience of the industry.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Logistics and Supply Chain
Advanced Diploma in Logistics and Supply Chain Management
Diploma in Logistics and Supply Chain Management

College_Summary: Don Bosco College, Kottiyam is conducting online UG admissions for management quota students. Candidates can visit the official website and apply online to the respective courses.

Government Polytechnic college was established in 1994. This institute is working in tutoring students who look for a proficient career opportunity after their 10th. The college offers diploma programs in computer engineering, electronic & communication engineering, and mechanical engineering.

The MGM Polytechnic in Kilimanoor is a private college established in 2011 by the Mar Gregorios Memorial Group of Institutions. This institute offers diploma courses in 5 engineering departments and 1 basic science department. The selection criteria are marks in the qualifying examination (12th). The admission form is available online.

College_Name: LV Prasad Film and TV Academy, Thiruvananthapuram
College_Summary: LV Prasad Film and TV Academy, Thiruvananthapuram is part of Prasad Group, Asia’s largest provider of post-production services. LPVA offers Diploma and Certification courses in the field of Digital Cinematography and Digital Filmmaking. Admissions are done on the basis of merit. The institute has 2 other campuses in Chennai and Bangalore.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Digital Film Making

College_Summary: Kerala Media Academy is a self-sufficient institution established in 1979. The College delivers media courses, like Diploma, Postgraduate diploma and certificate courses in different specializations. The admission to the institute is based on the merit of the last qualifying examination. The application process is online.

College_Name: College of Applied Science Nattika, Thrissur
College_Summary: College of Applied Science, Nattika is managed by IHRD and is affiliated to the Kerala University, Mahatma Gandhi University, Calicut and Kannur University. This college was established in 1993.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications [PGDCA]

College_Name: Creative Hut Institute of Photography, Kottayam
College_Summary: Creative Hut Institute of Photography, Kottayam is an exclusive Photography College that imparts photography education in a practical manner so that students can have all the expertise for a better future career aspect in Photography & Cinematography. Creative Hut Institute of Photography was established in 2007 in Kerala. Creative Hut is known for providing the best photography knowledge.

College_Name: Antonian College of Management Studies - [ACMS], Kochi
College_Summary: Antonian College Of Management Studies is a leading aviation institute in Kochi, Kerala. It was established by a group of professionals who have combined international experience in training, education and placements in the Aviation, Hospitality and Logistics sectors. ACMS, Kochi offers Diploma programs in five disciplines. Admission to the Diploma program will be done based on the candidate’s performance in Class 12 followed by a screening test.

College_Name: College of Pharmaceutical Sciences Government Medical College, Thiruvananthapuram
ICCS College of Engineering and Management, Thrissur
APJ Abdul Kalam School of Environmental Design, Muvattupuzha

DC School Of Architecture & Design ( DCSAAD)
College_Summary: DC School Of Architecture & Design (DCSAAD), Trivandrum is a private institute. The institute is affiliated to APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University. DCSAAD offers UG Courses in B.Arch and B.A in Interior Design. Admission to all the programs for the academic year 2024 has been started.Admission in B.Arch is based on a valid score in NATA. College_Summary: TKM Institute of Management, established in 1995 is affiliated to AICTE and NBA is a private institute which is affiliated to Kerala University, Thiruvananthapuram. TKMIM offers MBA courses in four disciplines at the postgraduate level. Admission to the MBA program will be done based on the candidate’s performance in CAT/ MAT/ KMAT Kerala. The highest placement package offered to TKMIM’s students is INR 10.20 LPA.

College_Name: Monti International Institute of Management Studies - [MIIMS], Malappuram
DC School of Management and Technology (DCSMAT)
College_Summary: DC School of Management and Technology (DCSMAT) is a private institute affiliated to Mahatma Gandhi University (MGU) and offers flagship course MBA. Admission to all the programs for the academic year 2024 has been started.Admission in MBA will be based on the scores of CAT/ CMAT/ KMAT.

College_Name: DCSMAT Campus - powered by Sunstone’s Edge, Idukki
College_Summary: DC School of Management and Technology, established in 2002 is a private institute which is affiliated to MGU, Kottayam and approved by AICTE. DCSMAT offers various courses at the UG and PG level in Business Administration, Architecture, Commerce, Arts and Interior Designing. The flagship courses of the institute are BBA and MBA in 7 specializations. Apart from that, DCSMT offers B.Arch, BA in Interior Designing, BBM, BCA and B.Com. for admission in the MBA course, candidates need to appear in CAT/CMAT/KMAT-Kerala and obtain a valid score. For enrollment in the B.Arch course, NATA scores are mandatory.

College_Name: Bhavan's College Of Arts and Commerce, Kochi

College_Summary: Sound Park Academy, Kochi, Kerala is a Private Institute. It is a kind of institution that offers talented students with next-generation opportunities through its various futuristic courses. Sound Park Academy offers students with various next-generation courses in the field of Sound Engineering and Voice Actors. The courses of the academy are mainly offered at the diploma and the Undergraduate level. The Undergraduate courses include B. Sc, and diploma courses include the courses in various fields like Interior Design, Sound Engineering etc.The Sound Park Academy is further linked with a professional group which has more than a decade and half of experience in the management of online radios, mainline advertising and own channels. The courses of the institute are affiliated with National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC).

College_Name: Indian Institute of Mass Communication - [IIMC], Kottayam

College_Summary: Saintgits Design School is a Kerala-based and AICTE-approved leading private institution that came into existence in Sep 2022 and offers an Undergraduate course in various Design domains. The college is affiliated with APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University (formerly known as Kerala Technological University) and has a team of well-qualified and extensively experienced teachers to teach students.

AIMER Business School is a Kerala-based prominent Private institution established in 2020 and offers an Undergraduate and a Postgraduate programs across various disciplines of Business Management. Admission to AIMER courses is granted to students and working professionals depending on the merit of last year's qualifying exam and combined performance in written tests, interviews, and entrance exams like the CAT. Each course comes with a mandatory paid internship of 6 months and practical projects, wherein, individuals get to interact with and learn from top-notch industry professionals.
